content.label: Past couple of days, 85% of the TASKS I’m doing toward the events are not being calculated or just not adding to reach milestones.. waste of time.. looks like there always ought to be some sort of issues with this game.. SMH.

When scoring in decision rivals....the end of the match when the whistle blows, the game keeps scoring,  THATS TOTAL BS!!!!!!!

Matches are not equal in regards to playing someone with a higher rating, it’s disheartening to enter a match you know you’ll lose.

The haptics are not good when it comes comes to playmaking when scoring, dribbling, crossing or passing.Also, a big feature that I’m frustrated with is going through an entire season to obtain high-level players rated at 95-125 and to play all of the champions league events and all the other events that are associated with the gameplay through the season to obtain high-level players only at the end of the season to find out that your season has been reset and you start off with all level 60 and 70 rating players.

This is not indicative of a real FIFA football, a real season doesn’t start with a whole new squad so I don’t understand why this game would have you going to a new season with an entire new squad that’s the part of this game that is very frustrating

FIFA 2020 came back in the way to make us all happy: gone are the smorgasbords of loot boxes and roulettes that nipped at our pockets. So far, it will take effort, time and purchases of select players and items to give your team the competitive edge. Underline the word “effort” as there are already a short supply of Events to bolster your currency account. Yet for all our grievances with FIFA 19, the lovely people at EA Sports seemed it prudent to gift every gamer with Kylian Mbappé! (An 86 rating Mbappé but it’s MBAPPÉ). You also get Martin Ødegaard, even so, his hefty 84 rating isn’t really a gift to the devout Barcelona fan that has to scour his roster of Madrid blotch. 

The gameplay is seemly clean of glitches and freezes, despite the residue of apparent programmed losing streaks that force you to update your roster or risk losing game progress. (But that’s the sin of every mobile game.) This latest version boasts improvement in gameplay, graphics, and the transfer market. To those who felt the structure of the time-honored mechanics begged for revamp, they can settle for harder shots on goal and more timed tackles to avoid concessions. Yet for all that, you will still gripe of button delays. Player models inch to being a little more realistic with not every blonde hair character looking like a stuffy Bastian Schweinsteiger, though they could bring squad numbers up to date as Pedri now dons a first-team number “16”, not “28”. FIFA 20 did also slack on dishing up creative player cards for most cards just feature headshots except for transfer add-ons. Transfer market is neither swarmed with player cards or not to be had. Pricing is reasonable, only that they still apparently “bump up” just when you got your pennies together. FIFA 2020 works at best to make its 2019 predecessor hiccups go away, but hold your breath if you were hoping for them all to be gone.

Short and sweet... if someone is not online or not manually controlling players then their players should not play at all. May I also suggest for being inactive after the first 35 minute should result into a forfeit because someone should not have to play for actual minutes against boring AI. All I want is for AI in h2h to not be as broken because currently player abuse the mechanics of auto play and make the game less enjoyable and for disconnected players to forfeit, thank you for your time:)

Absolutely horrible game with bugs that have been accumulated over 3 years with no clear fixes.  The game requires zero skill, poor play, card collection that is enabled buy buying packs. The game enshrine is horrible and prone to players cheating and has performance problems with high end WiFi Internet. Every season they promise to fix it and it gets worse. 

If you have enjoyed the many successful console titles from EA on FIFA this is not it. Philosophically the game has not been engineered with play in mind but rather collecting cards. It is particularly frustrating as player animation and results are very disconnected (opposition can tackle magically when they are far away). 

Customer support is poor at best. Cheaters are not stopped. Game has a lot of players with inappropriate comments. EA makes it hard to report this or bugs requiring a lengthy website input vs in game capability. 

The reviews seem to be selective. Online forums have better more detailed reviews

name.label: EA is going to delete this

content.label:
- Game crashes after every single match
- AI forever controlling your player
- Impossible to have 100% manual control over player 
- Passing is awful: passes always get intercepted as players stand and wait to receive pass 
- Movement Analog constantly switching to AUTO 
- Most opponent goals come from rebounds either from GK parrying it to opponent or from Crossbar
- Impossible to defend corners 
- Unrealistic long ball accuracy as most players attack by playing long balls that find their man every single time its played 
- Complete “Pay to win” game as the challenges are all designed to lure you into spending money
Lo mejor
Absolutely terrible. All i wanted to do was play with a friend and couldnt even do that. Just terrible.

Ok this is the season to delete the game. Anybody who thinks this is a good game has not yet realized it is all but a money machine. 
This was the fourth year for me and as it was getting worse and worse, it was time to say goodbye. Like several others I had been playing with in the league - some for the past 3 years - we have decided to delete the game as it is just that terrible. 
The rules are wrong when it comes to off-side or offside is called on you where only a computer could tell the difference. Often the red and yellow lines touched - how could anyone call that offline?. The behavior of the players is terrible and not even amateurs would play that stupid. 
The latest crap is the SBC, TOTW and icons. They are interlinked and complicated to understand how they all interrelate. And the harvest game is complicated and not winnable. Even if you take every chance you get, you cannot complete 2 rows. Winning the top prizes is never possible. And sometimes you need a PHD to figure out how to maximize winnings. 
Also it is again more about building teams and spending players for little reward. I am finding that I am only playing 3 of the 7 play options. The rest are junk. 
the season division is not worth playing. You need to build over 45 teams and each one will cost you upwards of 400000 coins. The rewards on the other hand are dismal. Who thought of this stupid game? Waste of time!
The game play is horrible. No control over passes, to whom and when. When I pass to the midfield they immediately pass back the the defensive line - why?! Even if I am in front of the goal with a clear shot... but wait... i first have to pass backwards... I want to pass to one player but the system passes to another player, no control. When the lose the ball, they just stand there. And most often they just pass directly to the opponent, not even trying to pass to the own player. Again, I do not have control over that. With a 94 OVR team you need to plan on 10 shots to have 1 hit the goal - the others miss or hit the post - always on the right side.  The best one: my player was touching the right goal post and missed the goal on the left!! How is that even possible???? Other things: they lay up the ball to take a shot... but lay it up right in front of the goalie. Or they lay up the ball then take a break, order a coffee or read a book before taking the shot. EA has managed to copy amateur soccer.  Absolutely stupid.
I like the game except my game is glitched on the weekend rivals to where after I tap on the screen my game is soft locked

Just when I thought, YOU EA, couldn’t get any worse, you guys find a way to make it worse than before. How do you expect someone to beat a bigger overall team with so little TIME! The passing, shooting, and headers are so UNACURATE. I’ve been playing this game since the 2014 World Cup mode and wow you guys downgraded so bad! You money thieves!!!!
Online league not working
When I’m trying to play verse other people it just freezes on me

This game would be much more effective and playable if the controls were USABLE. The joystick is unbelievably difficult to move effectively, especially with a floating joystick. Either way, sometimes if you miss touching the joystick, the player will randomly play the ball out of bounds or backwards. The matchmaking is quite ineffective for even odds, and the gameplay greatly limits what you can do if you don’t spend a ton of money. I’ve even SPENT a ton of money in this game to gain better odds and build my team, and it does not matter as the controls still constantly fail me along with matchmaking, and the rewards packages are trash even when I win multiple games. The PAID rewards packages are even garbage now. The game still crashes and glitches out constantly, causing me to lose a ton of games and potential rewards. Extremely disappointed as I’ve been into FIFA for years. I would like all the money I’ve spent and time I wasted back.
